test_cases.prompt: I want to learn to play the guitar.
test_cases.golden_response: I will learn to play the guitar by practicing for 30 minutes every day, and I will be able to play my first full song within 3 months.

test_cases.prompt: I want to get in shape.
test_cases.golden_response: I will get in shape by going to the gym 3 times a week and eating a healthy diet. I will lose 10 pounds in the next 2 months.
